definition: to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: Objective It is to discuss the action mechanism of Yunpi Wenyang method on infantile persisting diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨运脾温阳法治疗小儿迁延性腹泻的作用机制。

sentences.english: No local peritonitis or uncurable fistula occurred after withdrawal of the tube.
sentences.chinese: 拔管后无局限性腹膜炎或瘘口迁延不愈。

sentences.english: The disease have long-course radiotherapy and much of complications.
sentences.chinese: 该病病情迁延反复，疗程长，并发症多。

sentences.english: To observe the clinical cure effect of Zhierling Granule on children refractory diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨运脾温阳法治疗小儿迁延性腹泻的作用机制。

sentences.english: The chronic bacteria carrying duration could be up to 30 days only in a few sheep.
sentences.chinese: 在迁延型患羊中极个别可慢性带菌30天。

sentences.english: Hematuria is one of the main symptoms, which is often recurrent, refractory protracted illness.
sentences.chinese: 血尿是其主要症状之一，常反复发作，病情迁延难愈。

sentences.english: Can these data explain whether early stuttering will persist?
sentences.chinese: 这些研究结果能解释早期的口吃是否会迁延不愈吗？
